### Communication Skills
   * Scientific writing
   * Oral presentations
   * Plotting results
   * Illustrations 

### Generic soft skills
   * People management (e.g. adviser, labmates, admin, etc)
   * Patience and perseverence
   * Large task management
   
### Technical skills
   * Coming up with ideas
   * Planning 
   * Learning appropriate methods to execute
   * Executing ideas
   * Data management
   * Grant raising (proposal writing)

### Research Ethics
    * Field ethics
    * Lab and animal ethics
    * Workplace harassment
    * Publication ethics
